(Yeah, that'll happen)

Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons/Punch:


Nemesis Enforcer continued walking, talking into his wrist commlink with 
Scatterblaster when he was suddenly shoved, slamming into the wall near him.  

Dark One watched as shots from Chaostaur struck the bulky Pyro who had taken 
shots for Nemesis Enforcer and laughed, raising his plasma rifle and firing 
off three bolts at Chaostaur.  He'd thought Nemesis was insane for making him 
and his team their bodyguards.

Mortar raised his grenade launcher, firing off two grenades that would 
explode on impact at Choastaur, taking a position near Pyro and Nemesis.

Hiss raised his fusion cannon, a single enormous blast of destructive energy 
launching itself at Chaostaur's left shoulder joint.

Scavenger stood to the side, opening a commlink to the bridge with Punch.  
"This is Scavenger, --"

---

"Yes, yes I know.  That bot took potshots at Nemesis.  I AM in the bridge." 
Punch sighed, activating internal defenses and getting a lock on Chaostaur.  
He activated the speakers throughout the ship.  "This is Punch, unit 
Chaostaur has attempted to kill our leader Nemesis Enforcer.  No doubt 
whoever brings him down first will receive something great from our leader."

Punch sat back in his chair, watching the battle in the hall continue from 
the comforts of the bridge.  He pressed a button, the entire Iron Fist 
locking down, all exits sealing shut magnetically and locking.
